channel.title: axis on ecmccfg
channel.description: Recent content in axis on ecmccfg

item.title: axes yaml configuration
item.description: instruction The config is processed by jinja2, the processor will set complain if mandatory kyes are missing. Likewise, missing optional keys are populated with default values. A minmal example is give at the end of this file. yaml is indentation sensitive! Below each of the mandatory keys will be explained. axis Basic definition of the axis. id Unique, numerical identifier. type Type of axis, options are joint and endeffector
